compute_nlda(noise_dist, tw_dist, lda_topics, phi, depth)

takes self.tnd_noise_distribution, self.lda_tw_dist, self.phi, self.top_words, and computes NLDA topics sets self.topics to the set of topics computed from noise distribution and topic word distribution :return: void

get_noise_distribution(t, tnd_noise_words_max=None)

takes self.tnd_noise_distribution and tnd_noise_words_max returns a list of (noise word, frequency) tuples ranked by frequency :param t: time period :param tnd_noise_words_max: :return: list of (noise word, frequency) tuples

get_topics(t, top_words=None)

takes top_words and self.topics, returns a list of topic lists of length top_words :param t: time period :param top_words: :return: list of topic lists

prepare_data(t)

takes dataset, sets self.dictionary and self.corpus for use in Mallet models and NLDA :return: void

Bases: object

compute_gtm()

takes dataset, gtm parameters, gtm mallet path, and computes gtm model on dataset sets self.gtm_tw_dist to the topic word distribution computed in gtm :return: void

compute_tnd()

takes dataset, tnd parameters, tnd mallet path, and computes tnd model on dataset sets self.tnd_noise_distribution to the noise distribution computed in tnd :return: void
